name: Chance For Glory
description:
Do you have what it takes to become a champion of the arena?

Chance For Glory is a classic battle arena game, in which you fight endless hordes of enemies. There is a twist however: Every few seconds, your  weapons change randomly. You never know what you will get! Can you adapt to ever changing conditions and claim the highest score?

How to play:

W,A,S,D - Movement

LMB - Attack

Mouse - Look around

M - Open Pause Menu
